author: tocheng
body:
Added JEC MC and EcalSimPulseShape to the following **MC GTs**

**Run1 MC GT**
103X_mcRun1_design_v1
103X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1
103X_mcRun1_pA_v1
103X_mcRun1_realistic_v1

**Run2 MC GT**
103X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1
103X_mcRun2_design_v1
103X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1
103X_mcRun2_startup_v1
103X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_deco_v1

**2017 MC GT**
103X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v1
103X_mc2017_realistic_v1
103X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v1
103X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v1

Added JEC MC,  EcalSimPulseShape and new L1 menu to the following **MC GTs**

**2018 MC GT**
103X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v4
103X_upgrade2018_design_v2
103X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4

**Post LS2**
103X_postLS2_design_v2
103X_postLS2_realistic_v2

**Phase 2**
103X_upgrade2023_realistic_v2

Added EcalSimPulseShape and new L1 menu to the following **data GTs**
103X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v2

Added EcalSimPulseShape, Pixel2DTemplate to the following **data GTs**
103X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v3
103X_dataRun2_v1

Added EcalSimPulseShape, Pixel2DTemplate and new L1 menu to the following **data GTs**
103X_dataRun2_relval_v3
title: [10.3.X][Update GTs] new JEC MC TAGs + 2D Pixel Templates + EcalSimPulseShape + L1 menu
